item.name: letters
letters only
general word characters only
general ignore punctuation
gwo
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, words only. Non-letters such as punctuation are ignored.

item.name: letters and hyphens
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, only word characters (as defined in Unicode) and the hyphen. All other characters are ignored.

item.name: letters and apostrophes
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, only word characters (as defined in Unicode) and the apostrophe variants ' and ’. All other characters are ignored. Note, this pattern will produce misleading results for texts that use single quotation marks.

item.name: letters hyphens and apostrophes
letters apostrophes and hyphens
letters, hyphens and apostrophes
letters, apostrophes and hyphens
letters, hyphens, and apostrophes
letters, apostrophes, and hyphens
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, only word characters (as defined in Unicode), the hyphen, and the apostrophe variants ' and ’. All other characters are ignored. Note, this pattern will produce misleading results for texts that use single quotation marks.

item.name: letters and punctuation
general non space characters
general include punctuation
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, treating not only series of letters as word tokens but also individual non-letter characters (e.g., punctuation).

item.name: nonspace
item.desc: General tokenization pattern for any language, treating any contiguous run of nonspace marks as a word.
